person.persName: James Clayton (Lawrence County, Missouri, farmer, 46th MO Inf private USA)

body.p: Lawrence County, Missouri, farmer and soldier. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Married to Arrena Bashaw Clayton in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on January 30, 1850. Father of Lucretia Clayton, Lucy A. Clayton, James T. Clayton, Francis M. Clayton, and William K. Clayton. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lawrence County, Missouri, in 1860. Served in the 46th Missouri Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from September 6, 1864, to March 6, 1865.
